bpp/descriptor.name: Easypay India PVT LTD.
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Easy Pay Incepted and incorporated to create a digitally inclusive world. Back in 2014, while researching & passionately working on the consumer service industry, we were mused with this idea of unleashing a brand called Easy Pay with strong conviction of “Organizing the Unorganized” retail sector in India.

descriptor.name: Taste Good Calcium Biscuits for Strong Bones in flavour of Kesar Pista and Vanilla. (Pack of 20)
descriptor.short_desc: Taste Good Calcium++ Biscuits ??Health in your pockets Are you taking sufficient calcium regularly? Is your body able to process enough calcium? No! Then try Taste Good Calcium++ Biscuits! ?Another addition from Taste Good to the list of foods rich in?calcium. Calcium is the most effective mineral that strengthens the bones, and teeth maintains their structure and carries many other essential functions in the body. Taste Good Calcium++ Biscuits are containing white Ragi also. Ragi is a rich source of Calcium and Dietary Fibre that keep your family active & healthy. However, reports say that only 50% of ingested calcium is absorbed, and Vitamin D regulates the calcium absorption in the body. Therefore, low vitamin D levels will further lower calcium levels in the body. We recommend choosing Taste Good Calcium++ Biscuits to balance your body with sufficient calcium and vitamin D levels. Azista Industries Pvt Ltd is the manufacturer and distributor of the product globally. We manufacture it through a specific process as per the standards as quality is our priority and pack it hygienically.?

descriptor.name: Amul Fresh Cream
descriptor.short_desc: Amul Fresh Cream is made from fresh and pure milk. It gives a smooth consistency to all your mouth-watering dishes. Be it your regular tea or coffee, or fruit salads, ice creams or paneer makhanwala, this cream makes your dish rich and delicious. It is further sterilised at a high temperature and packed aseptically to ensure that the cream stays fresh until opened. Buy this product online today.
descriptor.long_desc: Amul Fresh Cream is made from fresh and pure milk. It gives a smooth consistency to all your mouth-watering dishes. Be it your regular tea or coffee, or fruit salads, ice creams or paneer makhanwala, this cream makes your dish rich and delicious. It is further sterilised at a high temperature and packed aseptically to ensure that the cream stays fresh until opened. Buy this product online today.

descriptor.name: Britannia 100% Whole Wheat Bread 450 g
descriptor.short_desc: Make delicious sandwiches with Britannia 100% Whole Wheat Bread 450 g. This bread is ideal to dip in milk and eat, or toast it till golden brown with butter on top. Made from the finest ingredients, it is baked to perfection to make it soft and spongy. Go ahead, buy this product online now!
